QuotesDay.Title: Quote of the Day
QuotesDay.Text: "Our duty is to be useful, not according to our desires but according to our powers."
QuotesDay.Author: Henri Frederic Amiel

PopularQuotes.Title: Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "The awareness of our own strength makes us modest."
PopularQuotes.Author: Paul Cezanne

PopularQuotes.Title: Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "It is not the voice that commands the story; it is the ear."
PopularQuotes.Author: Italo Calvino

QuotesDay.Title: Art Quote of the Day
QuotesDay.Text: "What I didn't know was I was deeply attracted to the big space."
QuotesDay.Author: David Hockney

PopularQuotes.Title: Art Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found."
PopularQuotes.Author: Wilson Mizner

PopularQuotes.Title: Art Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "An empty canvas is a living wonder... far lovelier than certain pictures."
PopularQuotes.Author: Wassily Kandinsky

PopularQuotes.Title: Art Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny."
PopularQuotes.Author: Georges Braque

QuotesDay.Title: Funny Quote of the Day
QuotesDay.Text: "It is necessary for me to establish a winner image. Therefore, I have to beat somebody."
QuotesDay.Author: Richard M. Nixon

PopularQuotes.Title: Funny Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing."
PopularQuotes.Author: Vince Lombardi

PopularQuotes.Title: Funny Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "There must be quite a few things that a hot bath won't cure, but I don't know many of them."
PopularQuotes.Author: Sylvia Plath

PopularQuotes.Title: Funny Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "The internet is a great way to get on the net."
PopularQuotes.Author: Bob Dole

QuotesDay.Title: Love Quote of the Day
QuotesDay.Text: "Take away love and our earth is a tomb."
QuotesDay.Author: Robert Browning

PopularQuotes.Title: Love Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "Love and dignity cannot share the same abode."
PopularQuotes.Author: Ovid

PopularQuotes.Title: Love Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love."
PopularQuotes.Author: Carl Sagan

PopularQuotes.Title: Love Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us."
PopularQuotes.Author: Helen Keller

QuotesDay.Title: Nature Quote of the Day
QuotesDay.Text: "I perhaps owe having become a painter to flowers."
QuotesDay.Author: Claude Monet

PopularQuotes.Title: Nature Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you."
PopularQuotes.Author: Frank Lloyd Wright

PopularQuotes.Title: Nature Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "Nature is often hidden, sometimes overcome, seldom extinguished."
PopularQuotes.Author: Francis Bacon

PopularQuotes.Title: Nature Quote of the Day
PopularQuotes.Text: "When you go in search of honey you must expect to be stung by bees."
PopularQuotes.Author: Joseph Joubert
